title: Pervasive Computing: Design and Development
ziele: The course objective focuses on the fact that developing pervasive computing systems go way beyond the development of software for traditional computing systems, demanding e.g. abstractions for computing ensembles, real time, real space, goal orientedness, dependability, correctness, modalities of interaction, explicit and implicit use, usability and trust.
lehrinhalte: Design process models for pervasive computing systems; system models for adaptation, emergence, intellingence, ensembles and swarms; location, mobility and awareness models; software development based on programming abstractions for real time, location and space, context (multi-sensors), autonomy, self-managament and self-organisation, emergent behaviour.
equivalent: INMPPVOPCSD: VO Pervasive Computing Systems Development (3 ECTS)
